column4: Could someone tell me the best program to make a photo CD that can be read on a DVD player (not just one in a computer, but more importantly one that is connected to a television)
In K3B and in Brasero, I found Audio, Video and data projects, but not a photo project
I'll get off the channel once I get the answer or an indication that I need to look in another channel
there is an app let me check if i can find it
and is it free - open source?
yes is free and open, there are a few but i seen one that is very good still searching
and it's in the software center?
not sure i hope so! u can file bugs if it doesnt
If only I knew how to file bugs ... lolll
very easy, usually at the programs website or https://bugs.launchpad.net
